## Meeting.default.refreshCaptcha() method

Refreshes the captcha. As a result the meeting will have new captcha id, image and audio. If the refresh operation fails, meeting remains with the old captcha properties.

 Meeting

**Signature:**

```typescript
refreshCaptcha(): any;
```
**Returns:**

any
